entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow, -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 7:07 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow Shower and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: ESE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then south 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain or rain near noon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
